dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, so you know those lists that come out every year about the highest-paid actors and actresses?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, so you know those lists that come out every year about the highest-paid actors and actresses?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I love those! Always a bit shocking, like, who's making *that* much?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I love those! Always a bit shocking, like, who's making that much?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, this one for TV actresses, it's pretty wild. Sofia Vergara, still at number one, but get this â€“ she earned 73% more than Kaley Cuoco!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, this one for T V actresses, it's pretty wild. Sofia Vergara, still at number one, but get this - she earned seventy three percent more than Kaley Cuoco!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, 73% more? That's insane! But wasn't she like, the queen for ages just from Modern Family?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, seventy three percent more? That's insane! But wasn't she like, the queen for ages just from Modern Family?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: She was, but actually, her Modern Family salary isn't even the biggest part anymore. It's almost half from endorsements and licensing deals, like, with SharkNinja Coffee and Rooms To Go.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She was, but actually, her Modern Family salary isn't even the biggest part anymore. It's almost half from endorsements and licensing deals, like, with SharkNinja Coffee and Rooms To Go.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday. Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so it's less about the acting salary itself and more about the brand, you know? That makes sense. Her manager even said they focus on appealing to people outside the show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so it's less about the acting salary itself and more about the brand, you know? That makes sense. Her manager even said they focus on appealing to people outside the show.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our attention is on the people watching Modern Family and how to appeal to them outside of the show, too, Luis Balaguer, Vergaras manager and business partner, told Forbes in 2016.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Now, Kaley Cuoco at number two, Big Bang Theory, obviously. But here's a cool twist: 95% of her earnings are from the show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Now, Kaley Cuoco at number two, Big Bang Theory, obviously. But here's a cool twist: ninety five percent of her earnings are from the show.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By contrast, 95% of Cuoco's earnings can be attributed to her role on Big Bang Theory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but I remember hearing about that whole thing, um, where she and the male co-stars took a pay cut, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but I remember hearing about that whole thing, um, where she and the male co-stars took a pay cut, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they did! From like a million an episode to $900,000, just to free up cash for Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik. That's pretty wild solidarity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they did! From like a million an episode to nine hundred thousand dollars, just to free up cash for Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik. That's pretty wild solidarity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's actually really cool of them. Good for them!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's actually really cool of them. Good for them!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Then you've got Ellen Pompeo at three, Grey's Anatomy. She's, like, a master negotiator.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then you've got Ellen Pompeo at three, Grey's Anatomy. She's, like, a master negotiator.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Grey's Anatomy's Ellen Pompeo ($23.5 million) ranks third. Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. She's been there for 15 seasons, she's earned it, you know? She gets an upfront fee, backend, producer fees. She basically *is* Grey's Anatomy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. She's been there for fifteen seasons, she's earned it, you know? She gets an upfront fee, backend, producer fees. She basically is Grey's Anatomy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And then rounding out the top five, we have Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen, but apparently, endorsements haven't really worked out for *them* as much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And then rounding out the top five, we have Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen, but apparently, endorsements haven't really worked out for them as much.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rounding out the top five are Law & Order: SVU's Mariska Hargitay (No. 4, $13 million) and Modern Family's Julie Bowen (No. 5, $12.5 million). Both forgo endorsements and instead make their cash on screen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, which is interesting, because that's where Sofia Vergara makes so much. It just goes to show, like, it's not a one-size-fits-all strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, which is interesting, because that's where Sofia Vergara makes so much. It just goes to show, like, it's not a one-size-fits-all strategy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and overall, the top 10 actually earned *less* this year than last year. Which is a bit surprising, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and overall, the top ten actually earned less this year than last year. Which is a bit surprising, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, interesting. So it's not just upwards and onwards for everyone. Still, a lot of zeros there!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, interesting. So it's not just upwards and onwards for everyone. Still, a lot of zeros there!
